src:
In Pics : Janhvi Kapoor slays the airport style with sheer elegance
07 Nov 2019, 06:21 by TIMESOFINDIA.COM
Be it a gym look, airport look or a party appearance 'Dhadak' star Jahvi Kapoor certainly knows how to slay it all in the most elegant manner. Keeping up the trend, today also the pretty damsel was papped at the airport in a simple ethnic outfit.
This morning, Janhvi was snapped at the Mumbai airport as she headed to Amritsar for 'Dostana 2' schedule. In the photos, the millennial star is seen dressed in an olive blue Kurta paired with sharara, a sky blue dupatta and magenta colour juttis. She accessorised her look with pretty earrings. She was all smiling as she posed for the shutterbugs stationed there.
Check out the photos:






Meanwhile, on the professional front, apart from 'Dostana 2' Janhvi has an interesting line up ahead. She has her kitty full with projects like ' Gunjan Saxena - The Kargil Girl', 'RoohiAfza' and Karan Johar’s magnum opus film ' Takht'.
